    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Jack's Tattered Cape](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1482)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Monsters of Myth](/Sources.aspx?ID=107) pg. 94</row>

**Price** 30 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn cloak

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This ragged, mud-stained cape closes with a single black button engraved with a leering devil's face. When you [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=81), [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=36), or [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=37) (or Vault, if you're [Spring-Heeled Jack](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1739)), you gain a +1 item bonus to [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) or [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63) until the start of your next turn.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
